1  Grandma’s Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies  
2  
3  Ingredients:  
4  - 2 cups all-purpose flour  
5  - 1 tsp baking soda  
6  - ½ tsp salt  
7  - 1 cup unsalted butter, room temp  
8  - ¾ cup granulated sugar  
9  - ¾ cup brown sugar  
10 - 2 large eggs  
11 - 2 tsp vanilla extract  
12 - 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips  
13  
14 Directions:  
15 1. Preheat oven to 190 °C (375 °F).  
16 2. Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside.  
17 3. Cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy.  
18 4. Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla.  
19 5. Gradually mix dry ingredients into wet.  
20 6. Fold in chocolate chips; bake 9–11 min.
